snippet: The architect’s installation at Galerie Gmurzynska in Zurich — part iceberg, part cave, part shrine — was created in homage to Kurt Schwitters.
lead_paragraph: The architect’s installation at Galerie Gmurzynska in Zurich — part iceberg, part cave, part shrine — was created in homage to Kurt Schwitters.

headline.main: Zaha Hadid’s Last Project: A Tribute to a Dada Master
